bibl.title: Choliambs for Mary in a Papyrus Phylactery.
bibl.note: P. Berol. Inv. 21911 [ed.: William BRASHEAR, Vier Berliner Zaubertexte, ZPE 17 (1975) pp. 30-31 et pl. (= Suppl. Mag. I, 26)]. The opening lines are crude choliambic trimeters. Variants of the same metrical incantation.
bibl.seg: JORDAN David R., Choliambs for Mary in a Papyrus Phylactery.

P. Berol. Inv. 21911 [ed.: William BRASHEAR, Vier Berliner Zaubertexte, ZPE 17 (1975) pp. 30-31 et pl. (= Suppl. Mag. I, 26)]. The opening lines are crude choliambic trimeters. Variants of the same metrical incantation.
